pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mobility Oriented-Parity Metric // A set of tools to perform multiple versions of the Mobility Oriented-Parity metric. This multivariate analysis helps to characterize levels of dissimilarity between a set of conditions of reference and another set of conditions of interest. If predictive models are transferred to conditions different from those over which models were calibrated (trained), this metric helps to identify transfer conditions that differ substantially from those of calibration. These tools are implemented following principles proposed in Owens et al. (2013) doi:10.1016/j.ecolmodel.2013.04.011, and expanded to obtain more detailed results that aid in interpretation as in Cobos et al. (2024) doi:10.21425/fob.17.132916.
